name: LIFE-Saver Bot- Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam
name_original: LIFE-Saver Bot- Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam
description:
Hi....

This is a game for ludum dare 46 game jam, by Saleh Abdullah or Saleh ElHalaby for the theme "Make it alive".  It is basically about a doctor in the far future who has four patients that he needs to save from viruses, so he goes to each one of them and gives a robot that goes inside them and fights the viruses that they have to save them, there are four Patients, and each one is a level!
